property.description: If selected code for parameter checking is included in the build.

constraint.display: Requires ADC Normal/Group A (Scan End) Interrupt enabled
Requires ADC Group B (Scan End Group B) and Normal/Group A (SCAN_END) Interrupt enabled
Requires callback to be not NULL in Group Mode
Requires callback to be NULL in Continuous Mode
Unique name required for each instance

property.description: Module name

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol

property.description: Specify the ADC Unit to be used.
Specify the conversion resolution for this unit.
Specify the conversion result alignment.
Specify if the result register will be automatically cleared after the conversion result is read.
Specify the mode that this ADC unit is used in.
Calibration is required for all channels configured for differential input. Internal calibration is performed automatically during open for these channels unless it is disabled here.

property.display: Channel Scan Mask (channel availability varies by MCU)

property.description: In Normal mode of operation, this bitmask field is used to specify the channels that are enabled in that ADC unit. In group mode, this field is used to specify which channels belong to group A.

Specify the trigger type to be used for this unit.

property.display: Group B Trigger (Valid only in Group Scan Mode)

option.display: ELC Event (The only valid trigger for either group in Group Scan Mode)

property.display: Group Priority (Valid only in Group Scan Mode)
property.description: Determines whether an ongoing group B scan can be interrupted by a group A trigger, whether it should abort on a group A trigger, or if it should pause to allow group A scan and restart immediately after group A scan is complete.

option.display: Group A cannot interrupt Group B
Group A can interrupt Group B; Group B scan restarts at next trigger
Group A can interrupt Group B; Group B scan restarts immediately
Group A can interrupt Group B; Group B scan restarts immediately and scans continuously

property.description: Specify if addition or averaging needs to be done for any of the channels in this unit.

property.display: Addition/Averaging Mask (channel availability varies by MCU)

option.display: Select channels to perform addition/averaging below

option.display: Select channels for which individual sample and hold circuit is to be enabled

property.description: Specifies if this channel is included in the Sample and Hold Mask.
Specifies if this channel is included in the Sample and Hold Mask.
Specifies if this channel is included in the Sample and Hold Mask.

property.display: Sample Hold States (Applies only to the 3 channels selected above)
property.description: Specifies the updated sample-and-hold count for the channel dedicated sample-and-hold circuit

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer

property.description: A user callback function. If this callback function is provided, it is called from the interrupt service routine (ISR) each time the ADC scan completes.

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol

property.description: Select scan end interrupt priority.

property.display: Scan End Group B Interrupt Priority
property.description: Select group B scan end interrupt priority.
